long_description: The largest kids' pack from Patagonia, the Poco Mucho daypack lets your grade schooler comfortably carry it all- books, binders, lunch, water bottle, headphones and more. Roomy main compartment opens with a quick clamshell zipper; internal ID label helps identify the pack. Front zip pocket keeps smaller items secure and includes an organizer for pencils and a key clip to safeguard easily lost items. Mesh side pockets hold water bottles or muddy sneakers. Quick-access, brushed tricot-lined pocket protects sunglasses and treasured electronics. Padded, mesh-lined shoulder straps provide load-carrying comfort for school or the trail. Includes reflective zipper pulls and trim and a bike light attachment loop. Patagonia Poco Mucho daypack is made from tough yet supple 420-denier plain-weave oxford nylon with 840-denier ballistics nylon reinforcements; Durable Water Repellent finish.
short_description: The largest kids' pack from Patagonia, the Poco Mucho daypack lets your grade schooler comfortably carry it all- books, binders, lunch, water bottle, headphones and more.
